data.title: Tyumen, Russia
data.meta_description: April weather for Tyumen, Russia: In April, in Tyumen, snow falls for 8 days. How many days does it snow in April in Tyumen?
data.text:
Average high temperature in April: 9.4°C

The warmest month (with the highest average high temperature) is July (24.5°C).

The month with the lowest average high temperature is January (-10.7°C).

Average low temperature in April: -1.3°C

The month with the highest average low temperature is July (13.6°C).

The coldest month (with the lowest average low temperature) is January (-19.2°C).

Average daylight in April /

Average sunshine in April

Tyumen, Russia

Average daylight in April: 14h and 2min

The month with the longest days is June (Average daylight: 17h and 48min).

The month with the shortest days is December (Average daylight: 6h and 48min).

Average sunshine in April: 8h and 1min

The month with the most sunshine is July (Average sunshine: 10h and 36min).

The month with the least sunshine is December (Average sunshine: 1h and 48min).

Average UV index in April

Tyumen, Russia

Average UV index in April: 3

The months with the highest UV index are June and July (UV index 5).

The months with the lowest UV index are January, November and December (UV index 0).
